entries.title: ukrayna lenin'in yaratımı yapay ülkedir
entries.author: hgzr
entries.content:
vladimir putin sözü. bu sırada lenin'i gerçeklere dayanmayan temellerle ülke tasarlamak ve rusya'yı kaynaklardan mahrum etmekle suçlamıştır.

ve putin'in bu konuşmasından hemen sonra hala putin savunan ve ukrayna zaten ayrı bir devlet olamaz demeye getiren sosyalist insanlar var.

demek artık stalin değil, lenin'in de yıldızı sönüyor.

(bkz: #134173026)

referenced_content.title: vladimir-putin
referenced_content.author: hgzr
referenced_content.content:
(bkz: ukrayna lenin'in yaratımı yapay ülkedir)

"ı am not trying to put the blame on anyone. the situation in the country at that time, both before and after the civil war, was extremely complicated; it was critical. the only thing ı would like to say today is that this is exactly how it was. ıt is a historical fact. actually, as ı have already said, soviet ukraine is the result of the bolsheviks’ policy and can be rightfully called “vladimir lenin’s ukraine.” he was its creator and architect. this is fully and comprehensively corroborated by archival documents, including lenin’s harsh instructions regarding donbass, which was actually shoved into ukraine. and today the “grateful progeny” has overturned monuments to lenin in ukraine. they call it decommunization."

(bkz: #134161106)

entries.title: ukrayna lenin'in yaratımı yapay ülkedir
entries.author: downing street
entries.content: doğru olmayan başlıktır. ukrayna halkı saygıdeğer bir halktır.
